Uses of Package
edu.nyu.cs.adb

Classes in edu.nyu.cs.adb used by edu.nyu.cs.adb
Lock
           
Message
          A data structure that will be passed from the Transaction Manager to the Data Manager.
Message.Builder
          Builder class for Message
Operation
          Describes an operation to be done by the Data Manager
Operation.Builder
          Builder class for Operation
Operation.Opcode
          Operation code values
Response
          A response object sent from the Data Manager to the Transaction Manager
Response.Builder
          A buider class for Response
Response.Status
          Status codes
Transaction.Status
          A transaction is IDLE if: The transaction started but no operation READ or WRITE were added A transaction is ACTIVE if: Default status A transaction is WAIT if: Transaction is blocked because of a lock or because it cannot commit A transaction is ABORTED if: because of Deadlocks, site failures or timeout A Transaction is END if: All commit were successful
